participant_1.background:
I don't want to follow in my dad's footsteps and inherit his appliance store.
I watch YouTube videos about welding to learn new things and keep my mind off my best friend who just moved away.
I am known for my dedication and work ethic.
Music is not my thing.
My parents were born in Europe, but I was born in the United States.

participant_2.background:
I'm a stay-at-home mom who is trying to raise my children as best I can despite my health problems.
i have always had long hair.
I cannot be a professional MMA fighter because I need to see my opponents to fight them.
i recently bought a camper.
i do not like being asked a lot of questions.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for fun?
I am a stay-at-home mom, and I recently bought a camper so I can take my kids camping.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go camping. What are some of your favorite things to do in the outdoors?
I love to go hiking, swimming, and fishing. I also like to go kayaking and canoeing.
Those all sound like really fun things to do. I've never been kayaking or canoeing before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's really fun. What are some of your favorite things to do?
I like to go to the movies, read, and play video games. I also like to watch YouTube videos about welding.
I've never been welding before, but it looks really cool. What do you like about it?
I like the challenge of it. It's also really satisfying to see what you can create with it.
I can see how that would be satisfying. It sounds like you're really good at it.
Thanks! I've been practicing for a while.
You're welcome. I'm glad to hear that you're enjoying it.
Me too! I'm hoping to get better at it so I can start making things for my family.
That's a great idea. I'm sure they'll love it.
